sentences.sContent: She turned on the charm (= used her charm ) to all the men.
sentences.sCn: 她对所有那些男人都施展魅力。

sentences.sContent: We were charmed by the friendliness of the local people.
sentences.sCn: 我们被当地人的友好吸引住了。

trans.tranOther: a special quality someone or something has that makes people like them, feel attracted to them, or be easily influenced by them – used to show approval
to attract someone and make them like you, sometimes in order to make them do something for you
